post_text: June 5, 2019 at 11:02 PM#1hello everyoneI m pretty new to the ma2I would like to make a show file with all kinds of macros that i can use as a standard show file.my problem now is that I can't find any information about how to create and use macros.could someone help me. solving.g my problem by sending me a link to a good instruction or something.thank you very much already

posts.post_text: June 5, 2019 at 11:02 PM#1hello everyoneI m pretty new to the ma2I would like to make a show file with all kinds of macros that i can use as a standard show file.my problem now is that I can't find any information about how to create and use macros.could someone help me. solving.g my problem by sending me a link to a good instruction or something.thank you very much already

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: June 11, 2019 at 1:28 AM#2Go to Setup -> Import/Export -> Import -> Macros. Tap on "Predefined". Tap on "Name" at the top of the list on the right to highlight everything. Press {Import} at the bottom. You have just imported the ~230 predefined macros. These are agreatstarting place for learning about syntax and macros.

title: show file with macros
